content: Lu Chen, Shanghai Jiao Tong Univerisity Lu Chen Associate Professor X-LANCE Lab, School of Computer Science, Shanghai Jiao Tong University Shanghai Innovation Institution (SII) Email: chenlusz [AT] sjtu [DOT] edu [DOT] cn Address: 800 Dongchuan Road, Shanghai 200240, China Large Language Models (LLM) Group @SJTU X-LANCE Lab We are looking for Ph.D./master/undergraduate students and postdocs interested in Large Language Models (LLMs) and AI for Science. Please send your CV to me if you want to join us. 2025-03-20：正在招收2025年09月入学的普博生，方向为大模型与 AI for Science 的交叉方向，涉及大模型后训练、强化学习推理、大模型智能体、多模态大模型等细分方向，欢迎感兴趣的同学联系. 【招生启事】 2025-09-22：预计招收1-2名2026年入学的上海创智学院联培博士（普博生/硕转博），感兴趣的同学欢迎联系并关注上海创智学院金秋营招生信息.
